purpose: To illustrate how cross-selling credit cards to existing customers can be targeted based on their likelihood of approval and usage.
title: Cross-selling of credit cards to existing customers/members can be targeted to those who would likely be approved and use the card

bullets.text: Issuers should evaluate a customer’s existing bank relationship to determine approval and usage of card considering:
Who are your best performing customers? (cardholders or non-cardholders)
How can you best use performance/information on other financial products to evaluate credit eligibility for a cross-sell?
Determine if information can be proxy to be approved for credit card
Performance and value of those relationships

reasoning_strategy: Evaluate existing relationships and performance metrics to target likely approval candidates.

text_rules.emphasis_rule: Bold for key actions and criteria

chart.title: Likelihood to be approved for credit card product
